title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: API Endpoint Configuration
description: GET endpoint at /js/pets/:id for retrieving a single pet by ID.

title: Pet Retrieval
description: Retrieves a pet from the JavaScript store using the provided ID.

title: Success Response
description: Returns the pet data with appropriate status code or 404 if not found.
